Event Saved

You have calendar events associated with this list. Do you want to delete these events?
HoneyDew It is importing list

HoneyDew It supports importing data from either an .xls,.xlsx, .txt or .csv file. Just open the file on your phone and click the HoneyDewIt icon. The first row in all files must have an \"item\" header. There is also an option to add the following: \"quantity\", \"description\", \"discount\", \"unit\" type, as well as \"price\" per item. If you do not supply a quantity then a default quantity of 1 will be set. If using a .txt or .csv file please separate values by a \^. If you are importing from an .xls or .xlsx file then you have the ability to create separate lists for each sheet in the workbook. Please look at the images below for a sample of all files.
There was an error reading the file. This can sometimes happen if the file is corrupt or has the incorrect file extension.
Please enter a valid price.
Please enter a valid number for discount.

You cannot delete this item as it has been edited outside this application.

You have not selected any Sheets. If this was in error please try again

There were errors importing this item. Please click to fix.

There was a problem with your request. You will be redirected back to the home screen.

Your import has finished.
Unfortunately there was an unexpected error. Click "Send Report" to send an error report to AJB Technologies. Click on "Home" to be taken to HoneyDew-It home screen.
